message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer Alice, I appreciate it. I'm interested in the product but $12000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  Would you be willing to come down to $10500?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $11000. What do you think?
